metadata.title: CVE-2024-23170 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS 2.x before 2.28.7 and 3.x before 3.5.2.There was a timing side channel in RSA private operations. This sidechannel could be sufficient for a local attacker to recover the plaintext.It requires the attacker to send a large number of messages for decryption,as described in "Everlasting ROBOT: the Marvin Attack" by Hubert Kario.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
